alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:03PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yavapai County east of Peeples Valley through 145 PM MST... At 102 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wagoner, or 20 miles northeast of Wickenburg, moving southeast slowly at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Grove, Crown King and Wagoner. This includes State Route 89 between mile markers 282 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
